Sentencas: The fracture stress of the electrolyte determines the limit of the mechanical integrity of electrolyte supported solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Fracture test of thin sheet electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, the measurement of the fracture stress of thin sheet specimens typically leads to difficulties in experiment and analysis.
Titulo: Fracture test of thin sheet electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In particular evaluation problems arise in bending tests due to the non-linear deformation behaviour.
Titulo: Fracture test of thin sheet electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition to conventional bi-axial bending tests of 6ScSZ and 3YSZ electrolyte foils with a thickness of similar to 100 mu m a new method is introduced, which relies on ring-on-ring tests with composite specimens.
Titulo: Fracture test of thin sheet electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: By gluing the thin electrolyte foil on a steel substrate, non-linear deformation of the foils is avoided.
Titulo: Fracture test of thin sheet electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The method allows the correlation of the fracture stress with a defined electrolyte portion under maximum stress and hence a prediction of failure stresses and probabilities for real-size cells.
Titulo: Fracture test of thin sheet electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results reveal a higher characteristic fracture stress and Weibull modulus for the 3YSZ foils compared to those of the 6ScSZ variant.
Titulo: Fracture test of thin sheet electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In both electrolyte materials, failure of the foils appeared to be related to surface defects.
Titulo: Fracture test of thin sheet electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells
